quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson

quotes.quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Don't make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Foley

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Carl W. Buehner

quotes.quote: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián

quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: True friends are like diamonds — bright, beautiful, valuable, and always in style.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.author: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Friendship is the inexpressible comfort of feeling safe with a person, having neither to weigh thoughts nor measure words.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: There's not a word yet for old friends who've just met.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Friendship consists in forgetting what one gives and remembering what one receives.
quotes.author: Alexander Dumas

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Friends are the family you choose.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.
quotes.author: John Evelyn

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: Friendship doubles your joys, and divides your sorrows.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
quotes.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Friends are medicine for a wounded heart and vitamins for a hopeful soul.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: A friend is one soul abiding in two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.
quotes.author: Octavia Butler

quotes.quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Friendship is essentially a partnership.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The real test of friendship is can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.quote: Friendship with oneself is all-important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The tender friendships one gives up, on parting, leave their bite on the heart, but also a curious feeling of a treasure somewhere buried.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Friendship is a plant we must often water.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, for in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Friends are relatives you make for yourself.
quotes.author: Eustache Deschamps

quotes.quote: The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, not the kindly smile, nor the joy of companionship; it is the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when you discover that someone else believes in you and is willing to trust you with a friendship.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another.
quotes.author: Eustace Budgell

quotes.quote: A friend is a person with whom I may be sincere. Before him I may think aloud.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The antidote for fifty enemies is one friend.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Friendship that flows from the heart cannot be frozen by adversity, as the water that flows from the spring cannogt congeal in winter.
quotes.author: James Fenimore Cooper

quotes.quote: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only thing in the world concerning the usefulness of which all mankind are agreed.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: Friendship is not only doing something for someone, but it is caring for someone, which is what every person needs.
quotes.author: C. Neil Strait

quotes.quote: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.author: Donna Roberts

quotes.quote: Friendship is the wine of life.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication.
quotes.author: Anna Deavere Smith

quotes.quote: A friend is one before whom I may think aloud.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A friend may be waiting behind a stranger's face.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are people who know you really well and like you anyway.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: We need old friends to help us grow old and new friends to help us stay young.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The great thing about new friends is that they bring new energy to your soul.
quotes.author: Shanna Rodriguez

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who sees the pain in your eyes while everyone else believes the smile on your face.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The friends who listen to us are the ones we move toward, and we want to sit in their radius.
quotes.author: Karl Menninger

quotes.quote: The most basic and powerful way to connect to another person is to listen. Just listen.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: It's not what we have in life, but who we have in our life that matters.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is one who overlooks your broken fence and admires the flowers in your garden.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Truly great friends are hard to find, difficult to leave, and impossible to forget.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when they would rather be someplace else.
quotes.author: Len Wein

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson

quotes.quote: Growing apart doesn't change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who makes it easy to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Heidi Wills

quotes.quote: The best kind of friend is the one you could sit on a porch with, never saying a word, and walk away feeling like that was the best conversation you've had.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives means the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: A true friend is not someone who sees the good in you, they are someone who sees the good, the bad, the stupid, the annoying, the bossy, the selfish, the untidy, the freaky, the scary and still sticks around.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: No friendship is an accident.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: A true friend stabs you in the front.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Foley

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Friends should be like books, few, but hand-selected.
quotes.author: C.J. Langenhoven

quotes.quote: Real friendship is shown in times of trouble; prosperity is full of friends.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Every friendship travels at sometime through the black valley of despair. This tests every aspect of your affection. You lose the attraction and the magic.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Friendship is the purest love. It is the highest form of Love where nothing is asked for, no condition, where one simply enjoys giving.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Friendship isn't about whom you have known the longest... It's about who came, and never left your side.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: We'll be friends forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. 'Even longer,' Pooh answered.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Friendship is a horizon which expands whenever we approach it.
quotes.author: E.R. Hazlip

quotes.quote: A friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: I never had any friends later on like the ones I had when I was 12.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: All I required to be happy was friendship and people I could admire.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who never gets tired of listening to your pointless dramas over and over again.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: A true friend is the one who holds your hand and touches your heart.
quotes.author: Gabriel García Márquez

quotes.quote: Anybody can sympathize with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathize with a friend's success.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You've got a friend in me.
quotes.author: Randy Newman

quotes.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Friendship's the wine of life.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them... your smile, your hope, and your courage.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: A friend might well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: I value the friend who for me finds time on his calendar, but I cherish the friend who for me does not consult his calendar.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián

quotes.quote: The real test of friendship is: Can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: A good friend is a connection to life — a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: The best kind of friend is the kind you can sit on a porch swing with, never say a word, then walk away feeling like it was the best conversation you've ever had.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken it can rarely be put back together exactly the same way.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses.
quotes.author: David Storey

quotes.quote: There is magic in long-distance friendships. They let you relate to other human beings in a way that goes beyond being physically together and is often more profound.
quotes.author: Diana Cortes

quotes.quote: If you have good friends, no matter how much life is sucking, they can make you laugh.
quotes.author: P.C. Cast

quotes.quote: The capacity for friendship is God's way of apologizing for our families.
quotes.author: Jay McInerney

quotes.quote: You find out who your real friends are when you're involved in a scandal.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The best kind of friend is the one you could sit on a porch with, never saying a word, and walk away feeling like that was the best conversation you've had.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The rules of friendship are tacit, unconscious; they are not rational. In business, though, you have to think rationally.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Friendship's the privilege of private men; for wretched greatness knows no blessing so substantial.
quotes.author: Nahum Tate

quotes.quote: The friendships which last are those wherein each friend respects the other's dignity to the point of not really wanting anything from them.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
quotes.author: Len Wein

quotes.quote: Love is blind; friendship tries not to notice.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: There is as much difference between the counsel that a friend giveth, and that a man giveth himself, as there is between the counsel of a friend and of a flatterer. For there is no such flatterer as is a man's self.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A good friend is a connection to life — a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: There are big ships and small ships. But the best ship of all is friendship.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship that insists upon agreement on all matters is not worth the name.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A good friend is like a four-leaf clover; hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: A friend accepts us as we are yet helps us to be what we should.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes the heart warm.
quotes.author: Augustine Birrell

quotes.quote: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.
quotes.author: Anna Taylor

quotes.quote: The firmest friendships have been formed in mutual adversity, as iron is most strongly united by the fiercest flame.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Friendship with oneself is all-important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The friendships of the world are oft confederacies in vice, or leagues of pleasure.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Friends are the family we choose for ourselves.
quotes.author: Edna Buchanan

quotes.quote: True friends stab you in the front.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a rainbow between two hearts sharing seven colors: love, sadness, happiness, truth, faith, secret and respect.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship isn't a big thing — it's a million little things.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Friendship is the comfort of knowing that even when you feel alone, you aren't.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend accepts who you are but also helps you become who you should be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A sweet friendship refreshes the soul.
quotes.author: Proverbs 27:9

quotes.quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Friendship is when people know all about you but like you anyway.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's not being in the same house but feeling at home with each other.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Friendship is the true magic of life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: True friends are always together in spirit.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: A real friend is someone who would feel loss if you jumped on a train, or in front of one.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: True friends are those who came into your life, saw the most negative part of you, but are not ready to leave you, no matter how contagious you are to them.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A true friend encourages us, comforts us, supports us like a big easy chair, offering us a safe refuge from the world.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: A good friend will help you move. A best friend will help you move a body.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
quotes.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: Friendship is not about who you've known the longest, it's about who walked into your life, said 'I'm here for you,' and proved it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Only a true friend would be that truly honest.
quotes.author: Shrek

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Sometimes, being with your best friend, is all the therapy you need.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: I define friendship as a bond that transcends all barriers. When you are ready to expect anything and everything from friends, good, bad or ugly... that's what I call true friendship.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who says nice things behind your back.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is like standing on wet cement. The longer you stay, the harder it's to leave, and you can never go without leaving your footprints behind.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali
